Author: Microsoft Events
Description:
Building a thriving partner ecosystem starts with service to the customer. Customers have high expectations of cloud solution providers in order for them to be considered as trusted advisors. Learn about the new authorization requirements, what to consider as you explore the best tier for your organization and steps you need to take to be ready.
